name: lunfardobench
description: Benchmarking AI models on word meanings

scripts.all: bun run query.ts pete && bun run evaluate.ts ./responses/$(date -u +%F)/pete && bun run query.ts che && bun run evaluate.ts ./responses/$(date -u +%F)/che && bun run query.ts boludo && bun run evaluate.ts ./responses/$(date -u +%F)/boludo && bun run query.ts copado && bun run evaluate.ts ./responses/$(date -u +%F)/copado && bun run query.ts laburo && bun run evaluate.ts ./responses/$(date -u +%F)/laburo
